titles.title: How can I who am dead to sin

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
How can I who am dead to sin
Live any longer therein?
Oh, how can I who am dead to sin
Live any longer therein?

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
The old man says to me, "Yes you can",
And I tell him that I've been made free;
So how can I who am dead to sin
Live any longer therein?

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
He comes again with more subtlety,
And I wonder is this him or me;
So how can I who am dead to sin
Live any longer therein?

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
I'm learning to discern when he speaks to me,
'Cause I know that truly I'm free;
So how can I who am dead to sin
Live any longer therein?
